com.icetech.json_db
Class JSON_DB_EXTENDED

java.lang.Object
  com.icetech.json_db.JSON_DB_EXTENDED

public class JSON_DB_EXTENDED
extends java.lang.Object

Version:
1.0.0 This class is developed as a means to simplify the code base of the initial json_db implementation. It aims at using fully the java JSON API available to implement the CRUD functionality of the json_db library. This class is much more scalable and light-weight than the first implementation
Author:
Larry Akah

Method Detail

put

public JSON_DB_EXTENDED put(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> items)
                     throws JSONException
Inserts an entity set('row') into the data store

Parameters:
items - values for each 'column' in the entity
Returns:
the same instance for chaining multiple calls to this method.
Throws:
JSONException

get

public java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object>> get()
                                                          throws JSONException,
                                                                 java.lang.NullPointerException
Returns all entity entries from the data store. Each item of an entity is accompanied with the key or unique id of the items.

Throws:
JSONException - for errors during construction of a JSON data string.
java.lang.NullPointerException - for any null accessed variable

update

public boolean update(java.lang.String itemId,
                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> newItem)
updates a single item entry of an entity

Parameters:
itemId - provides the id of the item to be updated
newItem - the new set of data to be used to update the entry
Returns:
boolean indicating whether the item was successfully updated or not. True means item was updated, false means otherwise.

updateAll

public int updateAll(java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> items)
Updates all the items of a given entity

Returns:
the number of items successfully updated.

save

public boolean save()
Persists all data by making the data permanent in the preference file on the fileSystem Save all id's in a different preference

Returns:
true or false indicating whether the save was successful or not
